definitions.definition: the crime of intentionally killing a person:
examples: Two sisters have been charged with (= officially accused of) murder.

definitions.definition: to commit the crime of intentionally killing a person:
examples: Her husband was murdered by gunmen as she watched.

definitions.definition: If you say you will or could murder someone, you mean you are very angry with them:
examples: If he's late again, I'll murder him!

definitions.definition: to do or perform something very badly, so that you spoil it completely:
examples: karaoke singers who murder pop classics
